English: So, you're really sure this is going to work?
*Giggle* Of course. Whatever you have planned will work out just fine.
She's also important and special to me, too, you know.
I wouldn't play the fool with someone like you, who is her right-hand.
I'm still a little curious, though. Why won't you be celebrating with her?
I am a Draconic who butchered and consumed the Holy Dragon Oricana.
I'm in no position to celebrate the birth of someone so noble.
*Giggle* You really think that way? Why, aren't you adorable.
Shut up.
My business with you is done. I paid the price for what I need. Now leave.
*Giggle* How in the world could I leave now?
The fun part begins now~!
Where have you been, Morrah? I've been looking everywhere for you.
My apologies. I was just on my way to bring you a present.
A present?
I hope you'll like this.
Ugh...!
Wait! What is this?
Morrah, stop!
Maria...
Who are you...?
It's me, Oricana.
With the help from your friend
and the being that holds my spirit,
I'm able to have a little time with you.
Oricana...
Happy birthday to you.
I'm glad I can say it to you in person.
Thank you, Oricana.
Then, smile. I want to see your smile.
I'll be watching over you on your journey,
waiting to see the day you'll finally find your happiness.
Oricana! Please stay!
You're...
Urgh...
My head is killing me. Where's Maria?
Maria, are you okay?
So, how'd you like what I prepared for you?
Maria...?
Morrah.
I won't say I hated your present.
I was able to talk to Oricana. It was short, but I was happy.
Maria...!
Let me finish.
What you did was too dangerous!! You forced Oricana's consciousness to emerge, didn't you?
And I have a pretty good idea who was behind this.
You could have destroyed your own consciousness! Now, did I order you take such a risk for my present?
I-I'm sorry!
I thought Oricana being here would mean more to you on your special day.
I didn't think it through. I'm sorry, Maria.
...It's okay for you to be the one that gives me presents.
Pardon?
I'd like it just as much if it were you that celebrates or gives me presents on my birthday.
You're the one that's looking after me now, not Oricana.
Maria...
So, I forbid you to do something so dangerous in the future. Understood?
I never want to see you hurt yourself.
I will take your kind words to heart. And...
Happy birthday to you, Maria!
Where is Brother Esker...?
Everyone is busy with the preparations, but he disappeared again!
Ophelia, here!
Esker!
Did Lonian send you to find me?
He asked you to come back quickly
since we can't practice without you.
Alright, alright. Come on here.
Eh? We have to go back!
Come on~!
*Sigh*... How far are we going?
I think we are now too far from the troupe. You know the way back, right?
Just hold on.
Oh, there it is!
Why are we here...?
Agh!
That's a golem!
Let's go back quickly before it sees us...
Eh? We came here for that. Why would we go back?
Wait, we're here for the golem? Why?
Esker... What are you planning to do this time...?
Haha, nothing special.
I will give you something special if you defeat it.
Cheers! Go, Ophelia.
E-Esker! Brother! Don't leave me alone!
H-hello, Mr. Golem?
Esker told me to hurt you, but...
I don't really want to...
Kyaah!
*Beep, beep, bebeep!*
Calm down, Mr. Golem!
Esker! Eskerrrrr!
Esker! How could youuuu!?
Carta, Vellekia!
*Be, beep, Beeeep*
*Phew*... I'm sorry, Mr. Golem...
Wow, your skills have gotten a lot better!
You can even be independent from the troupe.
Esker! It was really a bad...
Wait, I will take that later.
Let's go since we got what we needed.
Where are you going this time~? Ughh!
Let's see, if I connect this here...
Done!
Happy birthday, Ophelia.
It's tiresome to pack up the tents every time we move, right?
So, I've prepared your own carriage.
Esker...
Are you touched? Speechless?
That was too dangerous!
I was so scared! You left me alone!
Were you scared? But that golem was just a hallucination.
I have already dealt with the real one...
You fought the golem alone? Why did you do something so dangerous?
Calm down, Ophelia.
And I'd rather be with the people in the troupe than being alone!
Haha, I guess things didn't go as I planned…
Esker! I hate you!
Argh! O-old man!
Oh, mister! Did you know that today's...
That hurts, you mongrel!
(Quiet, you fool!)
(If the old man finds out, he'll say that we're doing something stupid!)
Haha, but he'd only say that to you, right, mongrel?
(Who's a mongrel, you crazy...!?)
Hmm...
Haha... Ahahaha...
What? Velkinoth! You're feeling stiff right now?
Okay! Let's go shooting then!
(How cheap!!)
Eh.. Heh heh...
Oh, let me feed my cutie too!
Hey, cutie! It's time to eat!
Agh!
You disloyal mongrel!!
Since when did you have the right to call me that?
Huh, you're hitting the nail on the head! That makes me even more frustrated! Die!
No! You die!
Since you ran away first, you prepare all the ingredients for his birthday cake.
Alright? I'm not going to help. So do it on your own!
I've already got them ready, you fool!
Did you bring that recipe with you?
I highly doubt that you brought the right one. You probably burnt it since you're sloppy.
Hey, I'm not a clumsy mongrel like you.
I've kept it ever since I got it from my sister.
Let's try to hurry it up, then.
I don't want the old man to find out before we finish.
But why did Rose give the recipe to someone stupid like you?
I've asked her for the recipe,
because it was tooooooo delicious when she made it last time!
I doubt you would make it as good as she did.
Speaking of that, Rose said it tastes better if
I burn you up and add the ashes to the dough!
Hey! Be careful with the dough!
Agh! You crazy...!
Today, one of us will die!
Kyahaha! Should I make dough with burnt mongrel?
When we leave him, he will definitely be lonely.
He might wallow in the memories just like a fool all alone.
So, I want you to cover it with new memories.
Let him feel that we are together, and let him move forward with a smile.
P.S. He likes sweet food more than you think.
So...
All the mess you guys caused.. It was for this?
We're sorry..
Birthday...
...Eat it...
Eh, really?
Wahhh! You're the best, mister!
Thanks for the food!
*Groan*
Yuck!
Ewwwww…
It's all because you got terrible ingredients, you mongrel!
What? What are you talking about? It's because you were playing with fire while making it!
Die, die, die today!
Happy birthday, Erze.
Wow, Seria! You remembered our birthday!
Happy birthday to you too, Seria!
Tell me whatever you want for your birthday present!
You don't have to do anything for my birthday.
Being able to serve the Shadow Hilt family itself is a present for me.
Come on. You're the leader of the family, but before that, you're my only sister.
I just want you to not worry about your duties, just for today...
I even found a store that serves a very good parfait. We can stop by for our birthday!
I'm afraid I can't. I have this mission tomorrow...
Today is our birthday!
But...
You have to come with me, Seria!
Pretty please with a cherry on top?
...Fine, Erze.
I'll go with you.
But what did you get me, Seria?
Why don't you open it while we have the parfait you were talking about?
Why, it's like you were thinking about me on your birthday, sister!
You can't be so careless and forget to cast a barrier like this now, can you? *Giggle*
...Right. I was waiting for you.
Wow, I'm so touched!
It's because
I knew you would come for me today.
Aw, that's so typical of you.
A know-it-all pretending to know everything about me.
That pisses me off.
You're right. I know you inside and out.
And I knew that you would come to celebrate my birthday.
Such arrogance, as usual.
Right. I've come to leave a pretty bite mark on your neck for your special day.
How could I resist it when you're basically begging me to kill you?
You can't even imagine what this means to me.
Happy birthday, Seria!
What do you think I removed the barrier for?
Never in my life
have I wished for something for my birthday.
But this time was different.
I wished to have the chance to put you to rest, and it came true.
Kyaaaaaugh!
Do not... try to control me... with a toy like this!
Die!
Oh no, you don't look very well, Seria.
You must have had a nightmare.
Nightmare...
Yes, it was a nightmare.
An extremely sad one...
Thank you for your business. I look forward to your continued patronage.
Phew. Good work today. Don't you think so, Hoabis?
Meow!
Ah, Hoabis?
Hahaha! Welcome, my cute little customer~!
How can I help you~?
Meow, meow!
Oh, do you need something? What's that~?
Here you are! I found you.
Thank you for treating Hoabis well.
Meeeow! Meow!
(This energy... Soul of Oasis?)
(I did not expect to find it here. Fate must have brought me here.)
Oh, let me introduce myself. I am Zafir, the leader of the Mauhata Tribe.
I heard it from your little friend. Haha! I'm Kumuro~
If you can excuse me, may I ask you how you found and got the sword behind you?
Oh, are you interested in antiques too?
That sword... I found it when I was traveling through the desert, a couple of years before staying in the Orvel Guild~
It was pretty worn and damaged at that time~
I tried to restore it part by part, and now it's become an extraordinary sword~
The reason why I collect antiques and run the stores is~
for the satisfaction of restoring the former glory of things like that~
I see...
Meeeeeow!
I can see that you've put a lot of effort. I know this might not be easy for you, but could you sell it to me? I'm willing to pay as much as you want.
That sword was that of the royal family during the era of Ancient God King. It's like a relic for our desert tribe.
Meow!
I see~ If that is the case, take it~
I understand if you decline, but please consider... Huh??
Are you sure?
Your friend is saying that it is your birthday today~ So I'll give this to you as a birthday gift~
It is natural for something to be drawn back to its original owner~
I am more than happy that it revealed its true face to me during the time it was here~
I truly appreciate it!
But I cannot just take advantage of your generosity.
I, Zafir the Mauhata Tribe leader, will give you 80% of all earnings of the trade we've done this time as compensation.
Haha~ I thought it would be enough for us to get acquainted this time, but I suppose you think differently~
If you really mean that~ I will not refuse you~
Happy birthday!
Thank you.
Meooow!
That way! Get it!
Shoot... it's too fast!
Sir! The 1st Squad is down!
What?!
I-it was just a moment. From the darkness... urgh!
Who's there!?
Umm! Hm hm...
Wow! I didn't expect such a crowd for my birthday party.
It's sad that my sister isn't here... But I should be fine.
What, what did you do to my men!?
Eh... Those were your subordinates?
I thought they were my birthday presents, so I swallowed them all. Huhuhu...
Y-you, Demon!
Demon? Me? Do you think there is a Demon this attractive?
B... beautiful...
You pathetic idiots! Wake up!
Do you want to be like the guys in the 1st Squad?
Ugh, urgh!
Hm hm... Thank you so much for coming all the way from the empire.
So many visitors with much blood!
Today will be my best birthday party ever! Don't you think so?
Nonsense!
Everyone, prepare to engage!
Kyahaha!
Exciting, it's really exciting!
And your faces filled with despair make this even better!
Madness!
Attack! Kill that monster!
I ask you, please do not die easily!
Haha! Hm hm!
Such a sweet scent from blood!
I can remember it. The warm energy of life flowing through my neck...
Screams of despair, and the face of my sister looking at me...
That was the best birthday present ever.
How wonderful it was! How excited I was!
But...
It's not enough.
Not enough, not enough, not enough, not enough, not enough, not enough, not enough, not enough!
This is not enough!
Thirsty... Sister, I am so thirsty!
Why aren't you here to celebrate my birthday? Why are you not here to see me?
I will just endure this year's birthday with this...
Sister, please come and find me next year..
I am now able to swallow..
all of your Sweet Blood..
*Sigh*
*Sigh*
Seems like the day has finally come.
I will let this go just for today, for my sister.
What? Don't you know that you're not the one who's supposed to be saying that, knucklehead?
I should just do it myself, rather than work together with you, shorty.
Do you want to lose to that guy like last year? I don't want that.
This year, I will celebrate her birthday before that flirting fly does!
A-alright. Let's do it. Drat...
So, I will tell you about the contract once again. Don't forget.
First, we will not fight each other. We will give her presents at the same time.
Second, we will keep that flirting fly from giving his present before we do, no matter what.
See? Only two rules. Even you can remember that.
What do you mean by even 'me!?' Urgh!
Heh. I didn't expect you to keep your temper. Sweet! Now then…
Let's go. We won't let that mummy beat us this time!
I knew it...
Right?
Even the back of his head annoys me...
Hmm.. I guess this isn't enough... Then, let's add flowers here...
Will this do..?
Nope. That doesn't match the beauty of the Priestess of Water. Hey, is anyone here?
Hmm?
Haha! I did it! That mummy should have a tough time getting out of that pile of stones!
I'll be the first one to give her a present this time!
Hey, knucklehead! Remember, we're giving it at the same time!
Oh, right. What did you prepare by the way?
You don't need to worry about that. It's something that a knucklehead would never think of!
I was just asking out of courtesy! A shorty like you wouldn't understand, I guess.
Hmm?
Congratulations, Priestess. Happy birthday. And these are... hmm?
What's happening? An intruder?
I don't think so, it's from inside...
Ah, it happened, just as I feared.
You can ignore it. Just one less bother for me.
It's the thought that counts for me. I don't care much for presents or who gives them to me first.
But that doesn't seem to be the case for the kids.
I should give them a good scolding about messing up the building, shouldn't I?
I'll accept their presents after that.
Ahahaha...
Ahahaha...
(Darkness continues to encroach on the forest.)
(We received intel about the Demon being spotted at the outer regions in Elidora Forest too.)
Your Highness.
(The Dark Elves in Arrovina are still a bit hostile to us.)
Your Highness..?
(We also heard that the Barbarians on Windland Snow Mountain are not stable.)
(What should I do...?)
Princess Selene!
Ugh!
You seem to have many worries, Your Highness.
Yes... There are too many problems on the table.
For the safety of all, I must consider all possible threats in the future...
Er, that's great, Your Highness, but you've forgotten one thing.
The most important thing for all kin in the forest.
Have I? I could not think of any other...
Please tell me what I missed, Great Sage of the Forest.
Of course, I will. That's...
Today is Your Highness's birthday.
Happy birthday, Princess Selene.
I know it's a difficult time, but I want you to take a rest without many worries at least for today.
The fairies in the forest would feel the same way I do.
No great warrior can fight a good battle without a rest.
For the sake of victories of tomorrow, please just celebrate today.
Naila...
Hm hm, if that's what everyone feels, I shouldn't oppose what they want.
However, I cannot just celebrate when I think of my sister who's guarding the tower alone.
She easily gets lonely, too...
Hm hm...
Hahaha!
...? What's with the two of you?
You two siblings really are close.
I envy you, indeed.
Naila...
She's coming just in time.
She's a bit late, but that's Princess Dosarta.
Seleneeeee!
D-Dosarta? What about the tower...?
Seleneeeee... Eh, ouch!
Are you okay, Your Highness?
Of course, I'm fine! I'm not late, am I?
That's not the problem, Dosarta! How can you be here? What about the tower!?
I-I gave in charge, and...
Give in charge?
H-how... Do you know how important guarding the tower is!?
We're been guarding it for more than thousands of years! It's a strict and important duty, but you just..
B-but! Today's your birthday!
Should it be okay, just for a while?
Oh, my...
Now, now, you do not have to be so stern to your sister, Your Highness.
That's right. We asked the fairies to guard the tower, just for today.
Since Princess Dosarta had a good relationship with them, they agreed to it willingly.
Please do not worry.
Please get some rest today. It's all... the will of the Forest.
*Sigh*... I have no choice.
That was a big surprise. Then, you all better be ready to enjoy and celebrate!
Remember that an Elvish Princess is at her best when it comes to playing and partying. Don't let me down!
Of course, Selene! Happy birthday!
I will enjoy today to make up for the past year!
Hm hm, Happy birthday, Your Highness.
All the fairies in the forest are celebrating your birthday too.
Our kin and families are celebrating too. Happy birthday, Princess Selene.
Thank you, everyone. I hope you continue to support me as well.
